query: ("optical integrated sensing and communication" OR "optical ISAC" OR OW-ISAC AND ("reconfigurable intelligent surface" OR RIS OR metasurface OR "programmable metasurface") AND ("non-line-of-sight" OR NLoS OR "beyond line of sight") AND (turbulence OR Kolmogorov OR Rytov OR scintillation OR Fresnel OR "angular spectrum") NOT fiber NOT fibre AND Language:English AND (Content_Type:Articles OR Content_Type:Conferences OR Content_Type:Reviews) )
filters: Yıl: 2005–2025; Dil: English; Tür: Article/Conference/Review; NOT fiber/fibre
